mapper.select: SELECT t1.id, DATE_FORMAT( t1.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS create_time, DATE_FORMAT( t1.expect_end_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S' ) AS expect_end_time, t2.`name` AS user_name FROM tb_black_list t1 LEFT JOIN tb_user t2 ON t1.user_id = t2.id AND t1.`status` = '1' ORDER BY t1.create_time DESC
